short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension Refresh the Portlets every time you reach Netsuite Home

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension refreshes your Oracle NetSuite portlets whenever you login or accessing the NetSuite Dashboard automatically. 

Why choose this extension? 

* For a better NetSuite experience 

* Portlets get refreshed automatically on login or access your NetSuite Dashboard as it is not default in NetSuite. 

* To enjoy a dynamic dashboard 
 

Jobin & Jismi is a NetSuite solution provider with over 12 years of experience in NetSuite implementation, customization, administration, and integration services. 

Reach out to us at contactus@jobinandjismi.com.
